description.narrative: Provide capacity development services to support collaboration between MFIs, cooperatives and private sector companies for access to financial services in order to achieve profitable value chain for benefit of Burundian rural poor. The intervention will focus at capacity building and product development steered by the consultant but in close collaboration with the MFIs to come to viable and appropriate financial services of actors in the sesame value chain. This could be finances to farmers but also to traders and other actors in the chain. The final outcome will be appropriate financial services
